name: Shield Block
description: Reduces physical damage equal to your shield's AC + STR modifier for one round.

name: Shield Other
description: Grants close ally a bonus to AC equal to your shield's AC for one round.

name: Cleaving Attack
description: Attack close enemies in front of you.

name: Precise Attack
description: -1 to damage rolls, +1 to attack rolls.

name: Power Attack
description: -1 to attack rolls, +1 to damage rolls.

name: Improved Critical
description: Crit on 19+ with a chosen weapon.

name: Empower Spell
description: +1 DC to spell cast, +1 dice added to spell.

name: Extend Spell
description: +2 DC to spell cast, single target focus spells extend to one additional target.

name: Maximize Spell
description: +3 DC to spell cast, maximum dice rolls.

name: Transform Spell
description: +1 DC to spell cast, changes spell's elemental damage type to another.

name: Practiced Spellcaster
description: +1 spell known of appropriate caster level.

name: Lucky
description: Roll with advantage once per day, increases to twice per day at level 5.

name: Diehard
description: +3 rounds to your death timer when ununconscious.

name: Complex Person
description: +1 background experienced, cannot conflict with existing background.
